DOC.brief_summary: This study is conducted in Japan. The aim of this study is to collect data of production of insulin aspart specific antibody under normal clinical practice conditions.
DOC.brief_title: Special Survey of Production of Insulin Aspart Specific Antibody
DOC.mesh_term: Insulin degludec, insulin aspart drug combination
DOC.criteria: Patients with diabetes requiring insulin therapy Patients who had a treatment history of NovoRapidÂ® (insulin aspart)
